overview: Aspiring writer Mercedes Carrera unleashes her dominating alter ego Katrina Jade after spraying herself with perfume. When broke actress Alix Lynx can't afford to fix her car, mechanic Maddy O'Reilly offers her an alternative method of payment. Coach Abigail Mac makes a team player out of Mandy Muse after the baseball team tryouts. Samantha Rone brings a purse full of sex toys on her anal playdate with Georgia Jones. With the help of her alter ego Katrina Jade, meek Mercedes Carrera stands up to her controlling girlfriend Abella Danger.
title: Babes in Butts
